name: M&T Bank Corporation
description: M&T Bank Corporation is a bank holding company headquartered in Buffalo, New York, providing a wide range of financial services to individuals and businesses. Founded in 1856, M&T Bank has grown to become one of the largest banking institutions in the United States, known for its commitment to customer service and community involvement. The bank operates over 700 branches across New York, Maryland, Pennsylvania, New Jersey, Virginia, and Washington, D.C., offering services such as personal banking, commercial banking, investment services, and wealth management. M&T Bank is recognized for its strong financial performance and stability, playing a vital role in supporting local economies through loans, mortgages, and financial education initiatives. The company's mission is to make a positive difference in the lives of its customers and communities, emphasizing relationship banking and personalized service. M&T Bank leverages technology to enhance customer experience while maintaining a focus on traditional banking values. The bank's commitment to corporate social responsibility includes initiatives aimed at economic development, affordable housing, and financial literacy, demonstrating its dedication to fostering sustainable growth.

seo.meta_title: M&T Bank Corporation | Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore M&T Bank Corporation, a leading financial institution providing comprehensive banking services and supporting local communities since 1856.

faq.question: What services does M&T Bank offer?
faq.answer: M&T Bank offers personal banking, commercial banking, investment services, and wealth management.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of M&T Bank?
faq.answer: René F. Jones is the CEO of M&T Bank Corporation.

faq.question: Where is M&T Bank headquartered?
faq.answer: M&T Bank is headquartered in Buffalo, New York, USA.
